---
title: "Connecting without storing plain passwords at rest"
output: html_document
resource_files:
- config.yml
---

```{r}
library(DBI)
library(config)
library(rstudioapi)
dw <- get("faithful")
con <- dbConnect(
    odbc::odbc(),
    Driver = dw$driver,
    Server = dw$server,
    Port = dw$port,
    Database = dw$database,
    UID = dw$uid,
    PWD = Sys.getenv("pwd"),
    BoolAsChar = dw$boolsAsChar,
    timeout = dw$timeout
)
dbReadTable(con, "mtcars")
```
